channel.title: Front Left by the Speaker
channel.description: Recent content on Front Left by the Speaker

item.title: About
item.description: “Front Left by the Speaker” is not just a name, but a nod to that intimate corner of every club where sound meets soul. For those who breathe life into every beat and every groove, tapping into the essence of DJing – the stories spun through melodies and rhythms. Not for the applause or the spotlight, but for the sheer love of it. At “Front Left by the Speaker”, we aren’t just creators or curators, but first and foremost, avid consumers and lovers of music.

item.title: Accuraat's Bubble
item.description: This week i listened to a thing

item.title: Accuraat's Bubble
item.description: This week i listened to a thing

item.title: Radio
item.description: We’re offline now, so enjoy this video recommendation: Timetable - 2023-11-26 19:00 - 20:30: Protect The Bubble w/ Accuraat Amsterdam’s Accuraat delves deep into the delicate intricacies of sound and rhythm, taking listeners on adventures rich with curiosity. In their universe, genres fade into obscurity. While the essence often resonates with club vibes, Accuraat believes in myriad pathways to sonic pleasure. Their selections dance with cerebral elegance, blending mathematical precision and pulsating beats.
